articles.description: In a statement, Trai said that it has categorically rejected moving to 11-digit numbering scheme for mobiles.
articles.content: During the course of the consultation, most of the telecom operators opposed 11-digit numbering for mobile numbers. According to them, an 11-digit numbering scheme would lead to massive configuration… [+151 chars]

articles.title: IDC: 4.2 million wearables shipped in India during Q1 - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Shipments for wearables grew by 80% compared to the same period last year.
articles.content: According to the latest IDC report, wearable shipments during the January-March period in India have increased by over 80% on a yearly basis. The total units shipped for the period were 4.2 million. … [+1778 chars]
